Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0001
Entry.german: Hey. Du bist doch der Neue!
Entry.japanese: よぉ お前新入りだろ？

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0002
Entry.french: Qu'est-ce que ça peut te faire ?
Entry.german: Ja, was geht dich das an?
Entry.italian: Già, e a te cosa importa?

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0005
Entry.default: Hey, relax friend, you're all pent up.
Entry.french: Hé, détends-toi, t'es dans tous tes états.
Entry.german: Hey, immer locker bleiben, mein Freund.
Entry.italian: Ehi, rilassati amico, sei proprio teso.
Entry.spanish: Eh, relájate, no estés a la defensiva.
Entry.british: Hey, relax friend, you're all pent up.

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0006
Entry.default: Go easy, or they'll put you on medication.
Entry.french: File droit, ou ils te colleront des médocs.
Entry.german: Entspann dich oder die geben dir Medikamente.
Entry.italian: Datti una calmata o ti manderanno in infermeria.
Entry.spanish: Tranquilízate, o te hartarán de pastillas.
Entry.british: Go easy, or they'll put you on medication.
Entry.russian: Полегче, а то на таблетки посадят.
Entry.japanese: そういう態度は 目の敵にされるぜ

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0007
Entry.default: They did to me. Boy - nearly sent me insane.
Entry.french: Moi, j'y ai eu droit, et j'ai failli devenir dingue.
Entry.german: Genau wie mir. Mann ... ich wär fast ausgetickt.
Entry.italian: A me è successo. Ragazzi, sono quasi uscito di testa.
Entry.spanish: A mí me lo hicieron. Tío, casi me vuelvo loco.
Entry.british: They did to me. Boy - nearly sent me insane.
Entry.russian: Меня вот посадили - я чуть башкой не поехал.
Entry.japanese: 俺もそうだった ひでえ目にあったよ

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0008
Entry.default: That's fascinating... now if you'll excuse me.
Entry.french: Super... Bon, si tu veux bien m'excuser.
Entry.german: Ist ja toll ... und jetzt entschuldige mich.
Entry.italian: Ah, interessante... Ora, se mi puoi scusare...
Entry.spanish: Muy interesante... Ahora, si me disculpas.
Entry.british: That's fascinating... now if you'll excuse me.
Entry.japanese: あっそう じゃあな

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0009
Entry.german: Ich sagte, du sollst locker bleiben.

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0011
Entry.german: Hör mir jetzt gut zu, Kumpel.
Entry.japanese: いいから話を聞けって

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0012
Entry.default: you just arrived at the toughest school in the country
Entry.french: Tu viens de débarquer dans une des pires écoles du pays.
Entry.german: Du bist hier in der härtesten Schule des Landes ...
Entry.italian: sei appena arrivato nella scuola più dura del paese
Entry.spanish: acabas de llegar a la escuela más dura de este país,
Entry.british: you just arrived at the toughest school in the country
Entry.russian: Ты заявился в самую суровую школу в стране,
Entry.japanese: この学校は 全米一面倒な場所だ

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0013
Entry.default: and I'm offering to be your friend.
Entry.french: Et moi, je t'offre mon amitié.
Entry.german: und ich biete dir meine Freundschaft an.
Entry.italian: e io ti offro di diventare mio amico.
Entry.spanish: y te estoy ofreciendo mi amistad.
Entry.british: and I'm offering to be your friend.
Entry.japanese: 仲間の一人もいた方がいいと思うぜ

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0014
Entry.default: Trust me, in a place like this, you're gonna need friends.
Entry.french: Crois-moi, dans un endroit pareil, va te falloir des potes.
Entry.german: Und glaub mir: An einem Ort wie diesem brauchst du Freunde.
Entry.italian: Credimi, in un posto come questo avrai bisogno di amici.
Entry.spanish: Créeme, en un sitio como este, necesitarás amigos.
Entry.british: Trust me, in a place like this, you're gonna need friends.
Entry.russian: Можешь поверить, в таком месте без корешей не обойтись.
Entry.japanese: この学校は一匹狼が~n~通用するほど甘くない

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0015
Entry.default: So it's up to you. You gonna play nice, or what?
Entry.french: Alors, qu'est-ce que t'en dis ? T'arrêtes de jouer les gros bras ?
Entry.german: Es liegt also an dir. Freunde oder nicht?
Entry.italian: Quindi dipende da te. Sarai carino, o cosa?
Entry.spanish: ¿Qué piensas hacer? ¿Vas a seguir las reglas, o qué?
Entry.british: So it's up to you. You gonna play nice, or what?
Entry.russian: Так что сам решай: дружить будем, или как?
Entry.japanese: どうだ？ 少しは話を聞く気になったか？

Entry.name: 1-02B.SUB0017
Entry.default: Good. So, how about I show you around?
Entry.french: Cool. Bon, j'te fais une visite guidée ?
Entry.german: Gut. Soll ich dich ein bisschen rumführen?
Entry.italian: Bene. Che ne dici se ti faccio fare un tour?
Entry.spanish: Bien. ¿Quieres que te enseñe el lugar?
Entry.british: Good. So, how about I show you around?
Entry.russian: Клево. Показать тебе, че тут где?
Entry.japanese: 物分かりがいいんだな この辺を案内するぜ
